original_text: God did what Manoah had asked. The angel came again to visit Manoah's wife. She was resting in the fields and her husband was not with her.
korean_text: 하나님이 마노아의 목소리를 들으시니라 여인이 밭에 앉았을 때에 하나님의 사자가 다시 그에게 임하였으나 그의 남편 마노아는 함께 있지 아니한지라

sentences.original_text: God did what Manoah had asked
The angel came again to visit Manoah's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 천사가 다시 와서 마노아의 아내를 방문했다

sentences.original_text: She was resting in the fields
and her husband was not with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 남편은 그녀와 함께 있지 않았다
